title: ZK I Zettel 7,2m23b - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2m23b
					2 vgl. auch SS, S.15: "A symbolic system has modes ofintegration of its own, which may be called 'patternconsistency'. The most familiar example is the logicalconsistency of a cognitive system, but art styles andsystems of value-orientation are subject to the samekind of criteria of integration as a system in pattern terms".
